defaultLocale.name: uBlock Origin
defaultLocale.description: Finally, an efficient blocker. Easy on CPU and memory.
defaultLocale.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Finally, an efficient blocker. Easy on CPU and memory.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: 高効率ブロッカーが遂に登場。CPUとメモリーの負担を抑えます。
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: మొత్తానికి RAM ఇంకా CPU పై తేలికయిన, ఒక సమర్థవంతమైన నిరోధిని.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Finalmente, um bloqueador eficiente. Leve na CPU e memória.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Lõpuks on valminud tõhus blokeerija. Protsessori- ja mälusõbralik.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Finally, an efficient blocker. Easy on CPU and memory.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Un bloqueur de nuisances efficace, qui ménagera votre processeur et votre mémoire vive.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Einlik, in effisjinte adblocker. Brûkt hast gjin prosessorkrêft of ûnthâld.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Най-накрая, ефективен блокер. Щадящ процесора и паметта.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: অবশেষে, একটি দক্ষ বিজ্ঞাপন রোধক। সিপিইউ এবং মেমরি সহায়ক।
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Behingoz, blokeatzaile eraginkor bat. PUZ eta memorian arina.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Akhirnya, pemblokir iklan yang efisien. Ringan penggunaan CPU dan memori.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Äntligen en effektiv blockerare. Snäll mot både processor och minne.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Konečně efektivní blokovač. Nezatěžuje CPU a paměť.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Végre egy hatékony reklám- és követésblokkoló böngészőkhöz, amely kíméletes a processzorral és a memóriával.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: ಕೊನೆಗೂ, ಒಂದು ದಕ್ಷ ನಿರ್ಬಂಧಕ. ಮಿತವಾದ ಸಿಪಿಯೂ ಹಾಗು ಮೆಮೊರಿ ಬಳಕೆ.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Ефективний блокувальник реклами таки з’явився. Не навантажує процесор та пам'ять.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: آخر کار، ایک مؤثر اشتہار کو روکنے والا، یہ کم cpu اور میموری لیتا ہے.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Finfine rendimenta reklamoblokilo. Afabla por ĉefprocesoro kaj memoro.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Cuối cùng, đã có một công cụ chặn quảng cáo hiệu quả, tiêu tốn ít CPU và bộ nhớ.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: وأخيراً, مانع اعلانات كفوء. خفيف على المعالج و الذاكرة.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: როგორც იქნა, მძლავრი და შედეგიანი რეკლამების შემზღუდავი. ზოგავს CPU-ს და მეხსიერებას.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: 이 부가 기능은 효율적인 차단기입니다. CPU와 메모리에 주는 부담이 적습니다.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Finalmente, un blocker efficiente. Leggero sulla CPU e sulla memoria.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Endelig en effektiv blokkeringsutvidelse. Lavt CPU- og minnebruk.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: आख़िरकार, क्रोमियम-बेस्ड ब्राउज़रों के लिए एक कुशल अवरोधक। CPU और स्मृति पर आसान।
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: இறுதியாக, ஒரு திறமையான விளம்பரத் தடுப்பான். கணினியின் மையச் செயற்பகுதியின் மேலும் நினைவகத்தின் மேலும் இலகுவானது.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Axır ki, işlək bloker. CPU və yaddaş yönümlü.

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: มาแล้ว! โปรแกรมบล็อกโฆษณาเบาเบา ไม่กิน ซีพียู หรือ แรม
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Më në fund, një bllokues efikas që nuk e rëndon procesorin dhe memorien.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Endlich ein effizienter Blocker. Prozessor-freundlich und bescheiden beim Speicherbedarf.

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: शेवटी, एक कार्यक्षम ब्लॉकर क्रोमियम आधारित ब्राउझरांसाठी. सीपीयू आणि मेमरी वर सोपे जातो.

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Pagaliau, efektyvus blokatorius, neapkraunantis nei procesoriaus, nei darbinės atminties.

locales.description: Ó fin, un bloqueador eficiente que non chupa toda a memoria e o procesador.

locales.name: Dark Reader

locales.name: Dark Reader
locales.description: すべてのウェブサイトにダークテーマを適用します。夜間や毎日のブラウジングにDark Readerを使用し、あなたの目を気遣います。
locales.creator: Alexander Shutau

locales.name: Dark Reader
locales.description: Mode malam untuk semua situs web. Menjaga mata anda, menggunakan tema gelap untuk berselancar siang dan malam hari.
locales.creator: Alexander Shutau

locales.name: Dark Reader
locales.description: প্রত্যেক ওয়েবসাইটের জন্য ডার্কমোড। নিজ চোখের যত্ম নিন, নিত্যকার ব্রাউজিং এর জন্য ব্যবহার করুন ডার্ক থিম।
locales.creator: Alexander Shutau

locales.name: Dark Reader
locales.description: Tema escuro para todos os sites. Cuide dos seus olhos, use o Dark Reader para navegação noturna e diária.
locales.creator: Alexander Shutau

locales.name: Dark Reader
locales.description: حالت تاریک برای همه سایت ها. مراقب چشمانتان باشید، برای وبگردی در شب یا روز از حالت تاریک استفاده کنید.
locales.creator: Alexander Shutau

locales.name: Dark Reader
locales.description: Un thème sombre pour chaque site Web. Prenez soin de vos yeux, utilisez Dark Reader pour votre navigation nocturne et quotidienne.
locales.creator: Alexander Shutau

locales.name: Dark Reader
locales.description: Mörkt läge för varje webbplats. Ta hand om dina ögon, använd ett mörkt tema för nattlig och daglig surfning.
locales.creator: Alexander Shutau

locales.name: Dark Reader
locales.description: Tmavý motiv pro každou stránku. Používejte Dark Reader pro celodenní prohlížení webu a šetřete tak své oči.
locales.creator: Alexander Shutau

locales.name: Dark Reader
locales.description: Темний вигляд для кожного мережевого сайту. Піклуйтеся про свої очі, використовуйте темний вид для нічного та щоденного перегляду.
locales.creator: Alexander Shutau

locales.name: Dark Reader
locales.description: සෑම වෙබ් අඩවියක් සදහාම Dark mode. ඔබේ ඇස් සුරකින්න, රාත්‍රී සහ දිනපතා වෙබ් අඩවි ගවේෂණය කිරීමේදී Dark mode භාවිතා කරන්න.
locales.creator: Alexander Shutau

locales.name: Dark Reader
locales.description: الوضع المظلم لجميع المواقع. اعتن بعينيك، استعمل التنسيق الداكن للتصفح اليومي في الليل.
locales.creator: Alexander Shutau

locales.name: Dark Reader
locales.description: Chế độ tối cho mọi trang web. Chăm sóc đôi mắt của bạn, sử dụng chủ đề tối cho trình duyệt ban đêm và hàng ngày.
locales.creator: Alexander Shutau

locales.name: Dark Reader
locales.description: 모든 웹사이트에 다크 모드를 적용합니다. 밤이나 일상적인 웹 브라우징을 할 때 어두운 테마를 사용하여 눈을 보호하십시오.
locales.creator: Alexander Shutau

locales.name: Dark Reader
locales.description: Tema scuro per ogni sito. Prenditi cura dei tuoi occhi, usa Dark Reader per navigare giorno e notte.
locales.creator: Alexander Shutau

locales.name: Dark Reader
locales.description: Mørkt tema for alle nettsteder. Ta vare på øynene, bruk Dark Reader for nettleseren, dag og kveld.
locales.creator: Alexander Shutau

locales.name: Dark Reader
locales.description: हर वेबसाइट के लिए डार्क थीम। अपनी आंखों की देखभाल करें, रात और हर रोज़ की ब्राउज़िंग के लिए डार्क रीडर का उपयोग करें।

locales.name: Dark Reader
locales.description: เปลี่ยนเป็นโหมดมืดให้กับทุกๆเว็บเพื่อปกป้องสายตาของคุณ ใช้ธีมสีมืดสำหรับตอนกลางคืนและการท่องเว็บในชีวิตประจำวัน

locales.name: Dark Reader
locales.description: Dunkles Design für jede Website. Schonen Sie Ihre Augen und verwenden Sie Dark Reader für die Nacht und das tägliche Surfen.
locales.creator: Alexander Shutau

locales.name: Dark Reader
locales.description: Dark mode for every website. Take care of your eyes, use dark theme for night and daily browsing.

locales.name: Dark Reader
locales.description: Тёмная тема для каждого сайта. Берегите зрение, используйте Дарк Ридер для ночного или ежедневного просмотра веб-страниц.

locales.name: Dark Reader

locales.name: Dark Reader
locales.description: Temă întunecată pentru orice site. Ai grijă de ochii tăi, folosește Dark Reader pentru cititul noaptea și de zi cu zi.
